thread.title: Gronk Goes Shirtless At Parade, Chugs Beer, Laughs At The Number 69
thread.title_full: Gronk Goes Shirtless At Parade, Chugs Beer, Laughs At The Number 69

author: Samer Kalaf
title: Gronk Goes Shirtless At Parade, Chugs Beer, Laughs At The Number 69
text:
Photo: Billie Weiss/ Getty Images 
The video: 
When the Patriots arrived at City Hall, Gronk made the most of his microphone time by yelling and talking faster than his brain could think. “You wanna know something? When we get six, your boy right here’s gonna be part of six, baby! Let’s go!” 
“Who’s getting wild tonight?” Gronk asked before handing off the mic. Teammate Devin McCourty could be heard saying something about “69,” which made Gronk chuckle. 
Should you encounter a wild Gronk in your travels tonight—or any other night—let us know at . Recommended Stories
